ICANDELO LOMPHATHISWA WEZEMIDLALO NOLONWABO: UBUME






UBUME



IINDABA



UQHAGAMSHELWANO



ICandelo loMphathiswa lilo elijongene nemigaqo-nkqubo nokuqulunqwa kwemithetho ngokubhekiselele kwezemidlalo nolonwaboi. Eli Candelo loMphathiswa likwajongene noku kulandelayo:
* nokusungula imigaqo-nkqubo nemithetho yesizwe
* nokulungelelanisa imisebenzi yeSebe lezeMidlalo noLonwabo
* nokuqulunqa kwanokusungula imithetho
* nokuqhuba nayiphi na eminye imisebenzi yolawulo emiselwe kuMgaqo-siseko okanye kwimithetho yesizwe.


IWEBSITE: www.srsa.gov.za/contact.asp
